document.full_text: the patriarch of the sibling piano group 5 browns was sentenced to 10 years to life in prison by a judge in provo, utah for sexually abusing his daughters when they were children, a report said on thursday.
document.title: musicians' dad gets 10 years to life for sex abuse
lines_and_colors: the patriarch of the sibling piano group 5 browns was sentenced to 10 years to life in prison by a judge in provo, utah for sexually abusing his daughters when they were children, a report said on thursday.
